slogan.subtitle: Hi, Iâ€™m Rochenette Legaspina! ðŸ˜Š Iâ€™m passionate about creating meaningful and user-friendly design experiences. Explore my portfolio to see how I bring innovative design solutions to life!

paragraph.1: Iâ€™m Rochenette Legaspina, a UI/UX designer based in Philippines with a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering. My approach to design combines creativity and always driven by a desire to create meaningful, user-centered solutions.
paragraph.2: My path into UI/UX design started back in college, when I joined an organization of talented students with a shared passion for the gaming industry. I initially began as a 3D modeler, diving into the world of 3D design. Over time, my interest deepened, and I expanded my skillset to include 3D texturing and retopology. The creativity and technical challenge fascinated me, and I grew more eager to learn.
paragraph.3: One of the pivotal moments in my journey was meeting a mentor, a leader in the organization who introduced me to the world of UI/UX design. Inspired by their guidance, I transitioned into the field, focusing on designing user interfaces and experiences that were not only visually compelling but also highly functional.
paragraph.4: After graduating, my first role as a UI/UX designer at a software company gave me invaluable real-world experience. However, I wanted to deepen my understanding of the entire development process, so I took on a role as a Systems Analyst. This allowed me to collaborate more closely with both clients and team members, and gain insights into the broader project dynamics. In addition to my work as a UI/UX designer, I embraced the challenge of bridging the gap between design and development.
paragraph.5: Today, Iâ€™m excited to continue my journey in UI/UX design, always eager to take on inspiring projects that leave a meaningful impact. My goal is to create designs that not only look good but also serve a greater purpose, solving real problems and enhancing user experiences along the way.
